name: itglue
label: ITGlue
description: ITGlue is IT documentation software designed to help you maximize the efficiency, transparency and consistency of your team. This connector facilitates automated operations such as organizations, locations, configurations, domains, and flexible assets

fields.title: Server URL
fields.description: Specify the URL of the ITGlue server to which you will connect and perform automated operations. For example, https://api.itglue.com.
fields.name: server

fields.title: API Key
fields.name: api_key
fields.description: Specify the API Key that is configured for your account for using the ITGlue APIs.

fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.description:
Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not.
By default, this option is set as True.
fields.name: verify_ssl

operations.title: Get Organizations
operations.description: Retrieves all organizations or specific organization from ITGlue based on the input parameters you have specified.

parameters.title: Organization ID
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the organization based on which you want to retrieve organizations from ITGlue.
parameters.name: org_id

parameters.title: Organization Name
parameters.description: Specify the Name of the organization based on which you want to retrieve organizations from ITGlue.
parameters.name: org_name

parameters.title: Organization Type ID
parameters.description: Specify the Type ID of the organization based on which you want to retrieve organizations from ITGlue.
parameters.name: org_type_id

parameters.title: Organization Status ID
parameters.description: Specify the Status ID of the organization based on which you want to retrieve organizations from ITGlue.
parameters.name: org_status_id

parameters.title: Created At
parameters.description: Specify the DateTime when the organizations were created in ITGlue, and from when you want to retrieve organizations from ITGlue.
parameters.name: created_at

parameters.title: Updated At
parameters.description: Specify the DateTime when the organizations were updated in ITGlue, and from when you want to retrieve organizations from ITGlue.
parameters.name: updated_at

parameters.title: Page Size
parameters.description: Specify the number of results, per page, that you want to include in the response of this operation. The maximum number of results per page is set to 50 items.
parameters.name: page_size

parameters.title: Page Number
parameters.description: Page number from which you want to retrieve records. The header of the response contains the number of the next page and the total number of results.
parameters.name: page_number

parameters.title: Additional Fields
parameters.name: additional_fields
parameters.tooltip: Additional fields, in the JSON format, based on which you want to retrieve organizations from ITGlue.
parameters.description: Additional fields, in the JSON format, based on which you want to retrieve organizations from ITGlue.

operations.title: Get Flexible Asset
operations.description: Retrieves all flexible assets from ITGlue based on the input parameters you have specified.

parameters.description: Specify the Type ID of the flexible asset based on which you want to retrieve flexible assets from ITGlue.

parameters.description: Specify the Name of the flexible asset based on which you want to retrieve flexible assets from ITGlue.

parameters.title: Organization ID
